author: dock_boss
content: I am curious is there plans to remove the legacy tx in the future? I saw there was debate over it  but I did't see where it ended

author: lightclient
content: I think it's possible sometime in the future when we switch over to SSZ encoded txs. However, sunsetting the legacy transaction is tricky business as we don't know if their are people out there relying on the RLP format of the signatures. I think if we were to remove legacy txs, it's quite possible we'd allow a precompile or something to still accept them when wrapped with an SSZ tx to maintain compatibility.
